title: Barrett Defeats Psycho Mantis With A Keyboard!? In Part 2 Of Metal Gear Solid
description:
We couldn’t stop thinking about Snake and our experience in Alaska! So we’re back at it again with Barrett and Mike’s first ever playthrough of Metal Gear Solid. Kevin and Blessing join us again for part two to help guide us through our journey. During this stream we are off to rescue Hal Emmerich and defeat Psycho Mantis!
